text: "Speechless" is a song by American recording artist Michael Jackson from his 2001 album Invincible. The song showcases Jackson's emotive vocal delivery and is characterized by its lush orchestration. It explores themes of love and the overwhelming feelings it can evoke, leaving one breathless and, as the title suggests, speechless. The track is noted for its heartfelt lyrics and Jackson's ability to convey deep emotion through his voice.
title: Speechless (Michael Jackson song)
